items.sentence: Tom is one of the most popular students in the class.
Let\'s look at the matter from another point of view.
The problem is that Tom doesn\'t get along with Mary.
I\'m not likely to be at tomorrow morning\'s meeting.
Tom thought about what it would be like to kiss Mary.
Tell Tom what\'ll happen to him if he doesn\'t do it.
Tom said he didn\'t think he was very good at French.
Tom pointed out that I had forgotten to sign my name.
I went to the park with Tom the day before yesterday.
I went to the supermarket to buy some things for Tom.
